ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return fluxo = entity.Fields["FLUXO"].Instance if fluxo == None: return
widget.Entity.Fields["TRANSFDOBANCO"].LocalWhere = """A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.CONTABANCO FROM FX_CONTABANCOCONTAGERENCIAL B WHERE B.PLANOCONTAGERENCIAL = (SELECT C.PLANOGERENCIAL FROM FX_FLUXO C WHERE C.HANDLE = @CAMPO(FLUXO)))""" widget.Entity.Fields["TRANSFPARABANCO"].LocalWhere = """A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.CONTABANCO FROM FX_CONTABANCOCONTAGERENCIAL B WHERE B.PLANOCONTAGERENCIAL = (SELECT C.PLANOGERENCIAL FROM FX_FLUXO C WHERE C.HANDLE = @CAMPO(FLUXO)))"""
